DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate accuracy WaveLight FS200 femtosecond laser , assess 1 day 1 month post-operative optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) anterior segment corneal measurement compare pre-operative flap thickness target .
DOC.criteria: Willing able understand sign inform consent form . Have refractive error ( eye ) require refractive surgery . Willing undergo LASIK surgery use Wavelight® Refractive Suite . Myopia 0.00 12.0 Diopters preoperatively . Astigmatism 0.00 +6.00 Diopters preoperatively . Willing able attend postoperative examination per protocol schedule . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Participation clinical study within last 30 day . History previous corneal surgery either eye . Multifocal ablation either eye . PRK PTK surgery either eye . Suffering acute recur eye diseases either eye , corneal ulcer , cataract , etc . Any ocular disease and/or condition , Investigator 's clinical judgment , may put subject significant risk , compromise study result , interfere significantly subject 's participation study . Unable discontinue contact lens wear specify protocol . History Herpes simplex Herpes zoster keratitis . Active ocular rosacea . Lyme disease . Severe ocular allergy . Other medical condition use medication specify protocol . Pregnant plan become pregnant study . Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
